item.title: My relocation journal
item.description: I intend this to be a continuously updated journal of my journey/struggles with relocation to a completely different country with an alien language. There is no need to keep the country secret, it’s Germany. Berlin, to be precise. I am writing this 8 months after I first landed here, and it’s been a roller-coaster ride so far. To begin with, Why?
